shellshocker

Class SmartEnemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • shellshocker.EnemySprite
      • shellshocker.SmartEnemy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Location

    public class SmartEnemy
extends EnemySprite
    Creates a smart enemy object that impedes the movement of the user-controlled character. Smart enemies are capable of following the main character.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class shellshocker.EnemySprite

        type - the version of smartEnemy.
        x - the x-coordinate of the location of the object.
        y - the y-coordinate of the location of the object.
        h - the health status of the object.
